desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Perform up to 5 slashes forward, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: When Alice triggers <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> through Attribute Anomaly Buildup, the 5th hit of her next <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> is enhanced.

desc.0: When Alice's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</ct> reaches 1 bar, hold <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Hold to charge, expending up to 3 bars of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</ct>. Release <IconNormal /> or when <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</ct> is below 1 bar, Alice performs a series of slashes in an area centered on the target enemy, with the number of hits determined by charge level, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: When the Finishing Move of a three-stage charged <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Starshine Waltz</ct> hits, it triggers a special <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> effect: <ct color=#F0D12B>Polarity Assault</ct>. This deals DMG equal to {CAL:0+100,1,2}% of the original <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct>, ignoring Anomaly Buildup, and can interact with other Attribute Anomalies, including Physical, to trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct>.
desc.3: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</ct> does not accumulate when hitting an enemy.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconEvade /> to activate:
desc.1: A quick dash dodge.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Slashes enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Slash and kick enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconSpecial /> to activate:
desc.1: Hurl the blade to strike and pass through enemies ahead, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Upon activating this skill, a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> can be triggered.
desc.3: After triggering a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct>, press <IconNormal /> to follow up with the 5th hit of a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

EXSpecialAttackAuroraThrustNorthernCross.name: EX Special Attack: Aurora Thrust - Northern Cross

desc.0: With enough energy, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} forward and press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: A thrust attack that goes through enemies ahead, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Activating the skill can trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> and restores 10 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

EXSpecialAttackAuroraThrustSouthernCross.name: EX Special Attack: Aurora Thrust - Southern Cross

desc.0: With enough energy, and without moving the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} or when dragging it backwards, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Back away with a slash, then thrust forward, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Activating the skill can trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> and restores 10 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes powerful consecutive slashes at enemies ahead, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes powerful slashes at enemies in a large area ahead, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Activating this skill restores 200 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</ct>.
desc.3: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</ct> does not accumulate when hitting an enemy.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Slash and kick enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Charge forward and slash enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core.name: Core Passive: Twin Rainbows of the Swordheart

desc.0: After any squad member inflicts a <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly</ct> on an enemy, Alice deals additional DMG each 0.95s of its active duration, equal to 2.5% of the original Physical Anomaly DMG. If <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct> is triggered while the enemy is suffering a <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly</ct>, for every 1s of remaining <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly</ct> duration, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct> DMG multiplier increases by 18%, up to a max of {CAL:18*10,1,2}%.
desc.1: When Alice's attacks hit an enemy, she builds up <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</ct>. When she triggers an <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> through Anomaly Buildup, she gains 10 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</ct>. <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</ct> has a maximum of 300, with each 100 being 1 bar.
desc.2: When the Finishing Move of a three-stage charged <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Starshine Waltz</ct> lands, it triggers a special <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> effect: <ct color=#F0D12B>Polarity Assault</ct>, dealing {CAL:0+100,1,2}% of the original <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> DMG, ignoring Anomaly Buildup progress. This can be combined with any Attribute Anomaly, including Physical Anomaly, to trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct>.
desc.3: When Alice triggers <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> on an enemy, her <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>12.5%</ct> for 30s.

desc.0: After any squad member inflicts a <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly</ct> on an enemy, Alice deals additional DMG each 0.95s of its active duration, equal to 2.5% of the original Physical Anomaly DMG. If <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct> is triggered while the enemy is suffering a <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly</ct>, for every 1s of remaining <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly</ct> duration, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct> DMG multiplier increases by 18%, up to a max of {CAL:18*10,1,2}%.

If <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct> is triggered while the enemy is suffering a <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly</ct>, for every 1s of remaining <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly</ct> duration, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct> DMG multiplier increases by 18%, up to a max of {CAL:18*10,1,2}%.

desc.0: When another character in your squad is an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Support</ct> character:
desc.1: When any squad member triggers <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct>, Alice gains 30 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</ct>.
desc.2: If Alice's Anomaly Mastery exceeds 140, each additional point grants her 1.6 Anomaly Proficiency.
desc.3: Upon entering the battlefield, Alice gains 300 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</ct>. This effect can trigger once every 180s in Investigation Zone mode.

1.name: Palmful of Cilantro
1.desc: When Alice triggers a <ct color=#F0D12B>Polarity Assault</ct>, she gains 25 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</ct>. When she triggers <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> against an enemy, the target's DEF is reduced by 20% for 30s.

flavor.0: A sprig of coriander sways like a newborn green star,
flavor.1: So fragile her fingertips felt they might pass through it.
flavor.2: She slowly opened her trembling hands,
flavor.3: And held that flicker of feeling in her palms.
flavor.4: Her heart beat like a spring bud breaking the earth at dawn, just after the rain.

2.name: Sage at the Sword's Tip
2.desc: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Starfall Finale</ct>'s Finishing Move hits an enemy, it triggers <ct color=#F0D12B>Polarity Assault</ct>. All squad members' <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> DMG increases by 15%. <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct> DMG against enemies suffering from <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly</ct> increases by 15%. Upon entering the battlefield, Alice immediately gains 1,000 Decibels. Triggers once per 180s in Investigation Zone mode.

flavor.0: The silver blade dips low, kissing the frost-lined sage leaf.
flavor.1: This pre-battle salute is the girl's quiet show of composure.
flavor.2: Fear and helplessness lie frozen in the faded dreams of yesterday.
flavor.3: Her sword stirs, ready to trace the outline of the stars.
flavor.4: Dawn is near, and the flower bud waits to bloom.

3.name: Symmetrism
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.1: In symmetry, there was order, balance, and meaning. Without it, her bunny ears and tail would dull and droop, as if something lovely were about to vanish from her world.
flavor.2: "So... that's why you had to bring up my mismatched socks, and tried to take off my leg band?"
flavor.3: "I just can't stand your asymmetry! Just for a second, I swear — just one second!"

4.name: Rosemary on Her Lips
4.desc: Alice ignores 10% of the target's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</ct>. Enhanced <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Celestial Overture</ct> accumulates 25% more <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup</ct>.

flavor.0: The scent of rosemary lingered between her lips,
flavor.1: A vow searing and resolute, carried on every breath of frost.
flavor.2: Even as the air in her lungs turned cold and heavy,
flavor.3: The girl would never forget the spell called love.
flavor.4: "In the name of the Thymefields... I will never betray it."

5.name: Passion for the Supernatural
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: She couldn't resist scary paranormal things.
flavor.1: Within the paranormal hid the unknown and the dangerous. When she felt it, her bunny ears and tail would bristle in fright — only to become irresistibly smooth once she calmed down.
flavor.2: "So... that's why you always tag along on my ghost-hunting trips, even though you're scared out of your mind?"
flavor.3: "I just wanted to see what would happen... but it's so scary, I totally regret it! Just this once — I swear I'm not coming next time!"

6.name: A Heart of Thyme
6.desc: When Alice uses a third-stage charged <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Starshine Waltz</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Starfall Finale</ct>, she enters the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Victory State</ct> for 30s. During this time, whenever any squad member lands a hit on a target, Alice will follow up with an extra attack against the target, dealing Physical DMG equal to 3,300% of her Anomaly Proficiency. This effect can trigger once every 1s and is guaranteed to CRIT. This effect can trigger up to 6 times. Gaining the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Victory State</ct> again refreshes the available trigger count.

flavor.1: The night spent watching the stars,
flavor.2: The moment she came to understand what courage truly meant.
flavor.3: A fragrant wind swept the clouds away, and sunlight outshone the crystal chandelier.
flavor.4: The girl gave a gentle bow to the days gone by.
flavor.5: Then, slowly, she vanished into the field of thyme.
